site_name: Land At Royal Road Former Braganza Old Peoples Home Royal RoadLondonSouthwark
description: Request for:-  Confirmation that contamination condition 10 of outline planning permission dated 3 August 2010, ref: appeal ref: APP/A5840/A/10/2122852 (original ref: 09/AP/2388) has been discharged in full (only have partly discharged) from Southwark Council- Confirmation awaited that condition 26 of outline planning permission dated 3 August 2010, ref: appeal ref: APP/A5840/A/10/2122852 (original ref: 09/AP/2388) has also been discharged from Southwark Council- Confirmation that a Certificate of Maintenance has been issued in respect of the works pursuant to the Section 278 Agreement dated 30 October 2014 and that the works have been adopted, and all the obligations under the Agreement complied with- Confirmation that all the non-financial obligations (i.e.provisions relating to musco network, renewable energy technologies, travel plan and local economic delivery) in the Section 106 Agreement dated 8 September 2010 have been complied with
